userinterface.model

Class GUITextModelEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • userinterface.model.GUIModelEditor
              • userinterface.model.GUITextModelEditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.DocumentListener

    public class GUITextModelEditor
extends GUIModelEditor
implements javax.swing.event.DocumentListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener
    Editing pane with syntax highlighting and line numbers etc for text model files. Currently supports Prism and Pepa models. It also tells the GUIPrism, of which it is a member, about modified events.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • handler

        private GUIMultiModelHandler handler

      • editor

        private javax.swing.JEditorPane editor
        Standard java editor component for editing the model files. A custom editor kit is used to provide syntax highlighting and line numbers.

        The line numbers etc. gutter for the model editor.

      • showLineNumbersSetting

        private boolean showLineNumbersSetting
        Stores the current known Prism setting for the 'show line numbers' setting. Makes it possible to check if the setting has changed when a Prism setting change notification is issued.

    • Method Detail

      • initActions

        private void initActions()
        Helper method to initialize the actions used for the buttons.

      • initContextMenu

        private void initContextMenu()
        Helper method that initializes the items for the context menu. This menu will include cut, copy, paste, undo/redo, and find/replace functionality.

      • setContentType

        public void setContentType(java.lang.String contentType)
        Sets the content type of the editor, currently accepts 'text/prism' and 'text/pepa'. Setting the content type changes the editor kit of the editor to a kit that provides syntax highlighting etc for that content type.
        Parameters:
        contentType - The content type

      • read

        public void read(java.io.Reader reader,
                 java.lang.Object object)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the model editor with the text from the given stream reader, discards any previous content in the editor.
        Parameters:
        reader - A character stream reader
        object - An object describing the stream; this might be a string, a File, a URL, etc.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there was an IO error reading the input stream.
